content.question: If <math alttext="y equals, 3 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the third derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="negative 24 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 6 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="48 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>48</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="negative 216 times e raised to the negative 6 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>216</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="negative 24 times e raised to the negative 2 x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>24</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
